Summary: Glowing lights appear to hover and then disappear. Number of object range from 1 to 4 objects at a time
divs: Sighting Detailsthese lights are seen often in the same direction. We often go outside for smoke break and see these odd lights. They are very very bright they just appear for minutes and then quickly disappear. We Would like to know what they are or if others are reporting them. I'm unable to send picture and videos thru this ap. I would be happy to forward you the photo and video clip to a specific email Please feel free to contact me at the email listed above
